description: This file contains C source code implementing helper functions for data conversion and message unpacking, including deserialization of msgpack objects and external references. It appears to be part of a larger codebase related to handling message packing/unpacking and data processing within a specific system.

methods.name: msgpack_object * __finder(const char * name,msgpack_object_type expect_type,msgpack_object_map * map)
methods.description: Helper function to find a key within a msgpack map, matching by string name and expected type.
